data.headline: DOWNASDAQS&P 500RUSSELL 2000DOW - Stock Price Chart
bullets: Nvidia rebounds sharply on a multi-year AI chip partnership with Meta, sparking a broad rally in chip and software stocks
Analog Devices jumps on upbeat Q2 guidance, while Cadence, Synopsys, Palantir, and Amazon also advance
Apple gains on accelerated AI-wearables initiatives
Nasdaq outperforms with gains in the 1.2%–1.4% range, S&P 500 rises 0.8%–0.9% near record highs, and Dow adds 0.6%–0.7%
Earnings-driven movers Garmin, Global Payments, Wingstop, Moderna, and MSG Sports outperform, with MSG boosted by a planned Knicks/Rangers split
Palo Alto Networks reverses earlier losses and joins gains after reporting results
Recent strong industrial, durable-goods, and housing data, along with Treasury yields near multi-week lows, support risk sentiment
Gold trades above $4,900 and the dollar remains firm
Easing AI-sector jitters, including positive headlines on Elon Musk’s xAI funding, underpin market confidence
Traders eye FOMC minutes this afternoon amid broadly firmer global shares and ongoing 'Ex-America' rotation trends
